content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task, following the specified output format and rules:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Responding to Customer Inquiries and Claim Investigations

1. Review the customer inquiry or claim details to fully understand the situation and information needed.

2. Research the inquiry or claim, gathering relevant information from available systems and databases. Investigate the claim if needed to determine the appropriate resolution.

3. Compose a clear, professional response to the customer. If responding to an inquiry, provide the requested information or guidance. If notifying the customer of claim investigation results, summarize the findings and explain any planned adjustments.

4. Proofread the response for accuracy, clarity and professionalism. Ensure it properly addresses the customer's inquiry or notification needs.

5. Contact the customer using their preferred communication method, such as phone or email. If leaving a voicemail or sending an email, provide your contact information for any follow-up questions.

6. Document the customer interaction in the appropriate systems. Note the date, time, contact method, summary and outcome of the communication.

7. Follow up with the customer if needed to ensure their inquiry was fully resolved or that they understand the claim investigation outcome and any adjustments. Provide excellent service to maintain customer satisfaction.

</OUTPUT_TEXT>
